title: Person With White Cane Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Blind Person Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A person, often depicted as a person, walking with a white cane, indicating visual impairment or blindness. It signifies independence, mobility, and awareness of accessibility.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with a white cane emoji is depicted with a medium-light skin tone, showcasing Apple's commitment to inclusive representation and detailed design. The white cane is rendered with a subtle sheen, highlighting its importance as a mobility aid, while the figure itself has a gentle posture and smooth contours. This emoji symbolizes independence, navigation, and awareness of visual impairment, conveying resilience and empowerment.
